title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Backup: Advancing Cloud Resiliency with Shared Responsibility (SEC205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越备份：通过共同责任推进云韧性 (SEC205)
abstract: Under the shared responsibility model, you are responsible for security and protection of your cloud data – and that requires developing and maintaining a mature cyber resilience capability for your workloads. In this session, Pearl River Community College will share their experiences. We'll also cover how Cohesity’s AI-powered platform extends AWS-native protections to protect critical workloads, automate policy enforcement, and reduce recovery times. You’ll learn how to isolate backups from production accounts, detect attacks, and orchestrate near‑instant recovery across regions and clouds. Walk away with a blueprint for achieving resilience at a lower TCO than “backup‑only” approaches. This presentation is brought to you by Cohesity, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在共同责任模型下，您负责云数据的安全和保护——这需要为您的工作负载开发和维护成熟的网络韧性能力。在本次会议中，Pearl River Community College 将分享他们的经验。我们还将介绍 Cohesity 的 AI 驱动平台如何扩展 AWS 原生保护，以保护关键工作负载、自动执行策略并缩短恢复时间。您将了解如何将备份与生产账户隔离、检测攻击以及跨区域和云编排近乎即时的恢复。您将获得一个以低于"仅备份"方法的总体拥有成本实现韧性的蓝图。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cohesity 提供。
